DOC.brief_summary: A fast track recovery program (thoracic epidural anesthesia, carbohydrate drink preoperative, early removal of chest tubes) is evaluated compared to conventional perioperative treatment (patient controlled analgesia, no carbohydrate drink preoperative) in patients with FEV1 < 70% of expected value or < 1.5L who undergo resections of the lung.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Trial to Reduce Morbidity and Mortality After Lung Surgery in Patients With Reduced Pulmonary Capacity
DOC.criteria: resection of the lung FEV1 <70% of expected value or below 1.5L 1880y given written informed consent contraindication for epidural anesthesia prio ipsilateral thoracotomy chemotherapy <6 weeks prior to study enter existing pneumonia (fever, elevated WCC, elevated CRP)
